titlestmt.titleproper: Exhibits AAA and BBB Royal Patent: also Wills, Codicils, and Certified Copy of Possession given to Don Miguel de Peralta de la Cordoba, Baron of the Colorados of Baronial Estate in Arizona; and two supplemental reports 1883-1887

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Exhibits AAA and BBB Royal Patent: also Wills, Codicils, and Certified Copy of Possession given to Don Miguel de Peralta de la Cordoba, Baron of the Colorados of Baronial Estate in Arizona; and two supplemental reports 1883-1887

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: United States. Surveyor General of Arizona Territory.

did.abstract: Typescript (carbon) and photographs of documents supposedly granting the Royal Patent over certain lands known as Peralta Grant to Don Miguel de Peralta de la Cordoba. Includes laid in report regarding the boundary lines by R.C. Powers, 1883; and Application for preliminary survey and amended deraignment of title in the matter of Peralta Grant, 1887.

physdesc.label: Physical Description
physdesc.extent: 0.1 linear feet (1 v.): map, blueprint, facsims

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

did.langmaterial: Materials are in Spanish with selected English translations. Supplemental reports are in English.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Exhibits AAA and BBB Royal Patent: also Wills, Codicils, and Certified Copy of Possession given to Don Miguel de Peralta de la Cordoba, Baron of the Colorados of Baronial Estate in Arizona; and two supplemental reports (AZ 107). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Dr. F.W. Galbraith III, 1946.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript (carbon) and photographs of documents supposedly granting the Royal Patent over certain lands known as Peralta Grant to Don Miguel de Peralta de la Cordoba. Includes laid in report regarding the boundary lines by R.C. Powers, 1883; and Application for preliminary survey and amended deraignment of title in the matter of Peralta Grant, 1887.

relatedmaterial.p: The following collections also contain information about the Peralta Grant: AZ 108, AZ 109, AZ 110, and AZ 111.
